|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = x86 |cpu1spd = |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV160BBTC-90; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 8 |ram1chip = GLT;GLT5640L16-7TC; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8201CP; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:03:1B |oui = 00:03:1B |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, internal,, (19200,8,N,1),,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, 5-pin header,, JP1 |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Cellvision |manuf_model = CAS-330W |manuf_rev = B2 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 10/2005 |estprice = |upc = 603992506224 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B000BO0SFM |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Cellvision GLM-100 |rad1modif = PCI (non-standard connector) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT2560; |rad1chip2 = Ralink;RT2525; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "CAS-330W", "REV-B2", and PCB manuf. text (date code is '''0530''' - July 2005) is silkscreened on the top of the main board. "EPCS330ZA020", "MADE IN TAIWAN", and "CAS330WM2B2" is silkscreened on the bottom. :"EPWLGMR1X010" and some additional text (date code is '''0540''' - October 2005) is silkscreened on the wireless module (presumed model is '''GLM-100''' - it's on a label [along w/ the region and MAC] affixed to the RF shield). :All radial capacitors on the board are '''Canicon''' branded. The LDO voltage regulator is an '''AME''' AME1084ACDT (AME1084, ACDT, 0530). :A '''STMicroelectronics''' STV0676 CMOS sensor co-processor is on the main board. :"MADE IN TAIWAN" and "EP-CS390000CA"<...> is silkscreened on the back (visible portion without further disassembly) of the sensor board. ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ===Boot log=== 
RS.....[MAC: 00 03 1B 56 4F 31][MAC: 00 03 1B 5A 05 13][Random: 00 8D][system ready.....]
==Pictures== [[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::packaging| ]] -->[[Category:Retail Photo's Needed]]
